Text: is this included the penalty shoot out?

BTW I now this was a spoiler for some of you guys.

But the reason I split the files is that it is quicker to upload. I just get the 1st half out there as fast as I can and while you guys are downloading that, I prepare the 2nd half and so on.

The other reason is I have limited bandwidth, so smaller files means faster downloads and more seeders quicker. 

Anyways, if you guys don't like the way I do it let me know and I will wait until everything is ready. Of course this could mean an extra hour or two.

2nd half & extra time should be uploaded as 1 file and there should be no spoiler in title like this 1 has. 
Anyway u r doing a great job.

Thanks
